Job Description:
Candidate Should be B.E.IT with knowledge of PHP,  Java,  HTML/ CSS,  Java Script,  JQuery,  Project Management,  Good Communication skills,  Magento,  Word press,  API generation,  Payment Gateway Integration.	

 Should have 1- 4 years of experience in the same field.	

 Salary : 12000/ -  to 30000/ -  per month depending on the candidate.
